website_summaries.verdict: This pack of storage boxes is a great addition to traditional and contemporary nurseries. Offers good value for money.
pros: Boxes measure 11 x 11 x 11 inches and come in a pack of six
Plenty of room to store toys or clothes
Can be stacked or used in an existing shelving unit to hide clutter
Can be folded down flat when not in use to save space
cons: Not as sturdy as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Good size, sturdy bin
customer_reviews.text: These bins are fairly sturdy for being fabric. They are a tad small for the Ikea cube systems, (the larger shelves in the photo) but still work well. They fit perfectly in my Mainstays brand cubbies (from Walmart)....the smaller set of shelves in the 2nd photo. I will be buying more as I am using them in my craft room to hold all my crafting supplies. The bins are deep enough to hide lots of things in them. Overall I am pleased. I can't attest to how long they last as I just received them and haven't used them yet, but I have no doubts they will work great for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Collyn Soo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of the mainstay cubby units from Walmart but I was not happy with the quality and color options that they offered in the store for storage boxes. I decided to take the risk and order these online and I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the boxes. They were very easy to assemble and are made of a thick fabric material with hard sides. I will definitely consider them if I need additional storage boxes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie - Belle Hein

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!!! Holy price! I am so impressed with the quality for the price. We were going to buy some here at fred meyer for around $7-10 per basket. This was such a good deal. The color is nice and the handle part is great quality. Definitely recommend. I am curious what the other colors would look like too!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: They work ...
customer_reviews.text: So they are smaller than I would of wanted. My mistake for not checking the sizes. I assumed it was bigger- closer to the average size. Still gets the job done. Although probably not for long as the storage boxes are on not the best quality. The boxes easy bend and fold, and the mark remains- also making the box more flimsy and delicate. I guess the boxes could last a long time if not used often, or the weight can evenly be destributed to avoid it from breaking or folding. For someone like me (busy mom) this item wont last long. I should have invested in a product that could withstand more. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: BibiRetailThera-py

customer_reviews.title: Beware of "Natural" Color
customer_reviews.text: This product is about as expected for the price. Cheap materials but adequate for most purposes. HOWEVER one of the boxes I received appeared to have been previously opened, and sure enough the first box I pulled out had stains and dirt on it. Perhaps this would be unnoticeable on a darker color but on the "Natural" color it is very obvious. The fabric wrinkles very easily (even where there is cardboard backing) and again the light color makes it more noticeable. The color itself is more yellow than I expected... Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING deal
customer_reviews.text: i bought these foldable cubbies after getting rid of my dresser. & i needed a new place to store my clothes. the reviews convinced me to buy these, & IM SO GLAD. they look & feel so much more expensive than they actually were. the silver handle is gives it a more expensive touch which i love. if you’re a college student (like me), on a budget, or don’t like spending too much money then these are PERFECT. i’ve gotten so many compliments on these & my friends couldn’t believe i spent $18 on all 6.
customer_reviews.author: leonor hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fits in Storage units/ No plastic handles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bins and they are a Perfect fit for my Shelving unit, I also bought 2 other pair(both different companies) and a bit bigger - I didn't like either one and they don't fit like these one's, I only wish that they had another handle on the other side, but the metal handle is so much more sturdy then those plastic handles and also look so much nicer than cheap plastic, I would rather have these bins with one metal handle then the other Brand with 2 Plastic handles, And they hold a lot of stuff, and I've put heavier things in these bins and they're holding up well - ordered another set of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage and other uses.
customer_reviews.text: These bins are wonderful! I love to use them inside of storage cubical units that I have bought for my household. So many uses as in storing dog supplies, a set has become a CD storage holder inside of another unit and another is going to become dresser drawers in another unit in the guest room. They are sturdy and I can pick the color to go with our color scheme. I can see why college students use them in their dorms!
customer_reviews.author: Music & Book Fan

customer_reviews.title: ... cardboard they use reeks of chemicals and despite our best efforts to remove the odor
customer_reviews.text: The cardboard they use reeks of chemicals and despite our best efforts to remove the odor, they continue to smell and taint everything we put inside. Look nice and we like the handle. But the stench is the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: These were smaller than I expected. Really that's my own fault because they state everything. for what I paid they look very nice and we use them for our walk in coat closet and our baby's stuffed animal bookshelf from IKEA. Not the best but for the price they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Light and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I almost wish I could use these instead of the drawers in our dresser. They are deep enough to hold my sock collection and unmentionables and roomy enough to look through the pile to find what I am looking for. We are currently using them because our owners bathroom is being reno'd and we are encamped in the guest room. They are light enough to move around even when filled with clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Chall-Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are not chemically sensitive
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size, look nice, and seem like they would be sturdy enough for our use. Unfortunately they have a chemical? smell. I left them out for many many days hoping that they would air out but they never did. If the odor doesn't bother you, these would be great. Not great for me though. I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Jules M.

customer_reviews.title: Modern look
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my cube storage shelf. Slides in and out smoothly and the handles are great. This is my second set because I just got another shelf and wanted more storage containers. I now have the grey and cream colors and the look great alternating in color!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Best Cubes so far
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several different varieties of cubes so far and these are the best. The handles make such a huge difference. I use these on the top shelf of my closet, and the handles allow the cube to tolerate constant up and down use better than the cloth handles of other totes. They also seem to keep their shape better. Oh yeah, and they were packed in a box that was ONLY big enough for the contents! No wasted packaging! Also the color is gorgeous and went really well with the aqua striped cubes I got from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Abs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some nice canvas type bins for my laundry room and I'm so happy I found these. They are the perfect size to store extra towels, cleaning supplies, and extra toilet paper. They are good quality for the price and sturdier than the dollar tree bins I originally had in my laundry room. I will be ordering a swcond set to complete my laundry room makeover.
customer_reviews.author: carolina fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly into the shelves I built from Target. They match my room well and look very close to the image color. They feel a bit wobbly but seem sturdy enough. I wouldn’t put anything very heavy in them. But for organization and storage they are great. It helped to make my space so much cleaner and they are so easy to pull out of the shelves!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This was the third order of Cubbies that I recieved from this seller. The first two were well made and very durable. The last shipment had a gauze bottom instead of the same material as the sides, so they will only be able to hold very lightweight items. I will be returning this shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: annoying smell
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and would work well, BUT the smell is really annoying and I still have not been able to use them after days even though I had them near a window to try to air them out. I got similar boxes from two other companies before and I never had this issue before. I really hope it will go away over time, but nobody can be expected to wait for weeks or more for that.
customer_reviews.author: J. in California

customer_reviews.title: 11x11 bins
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. They look very expensive, and they fit like they were made for this storage unit. This is a nine cube storage unit, so I still need three more bins. These only came in a pack of six. I just love how they fit in the cube spaces. Now I need to figure out if I’ll buy six more bins or three different ones for the bottom cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical Storage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these storage containers as part of my closet organizing project. They are very sturdy, and help to place things high and keep my closet neat. I've added pictures on the front of each container to show what is inside, which helps make everything more efficient. Quality and durability are very good, and value was extremely good.
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: Moths, long wait, but decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Product definitely looks nice but it took about a week to get here (even though on the order page it said I could receive it in 2 days with prime. Also, I found atleast 1 dead moth in each drawer. Some dried up wings here and there. Stains are on it because of that but I guess I can wash it off. So I am disappointed with that. Overall they look nice and are sturdy but the dead moths left a powdery stain.
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large number of storage boxes and these seemed like the best deal. I was not disappointed. Typically storage boxes are $8-10 each. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Seabiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard Frame Is Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are apparently made with thin cardboard inside which makes them really fragile (my 18 month old damaged them within a short amount of time which was a huge bummer because we were using these for his toy storage). The only positive to that is that they are light weight. I wish the cardboard for the bottom had fabric on both sides. I think next time I spend the few extra bucks and get ones that are more sturdy..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't for the weird smell, I'd probably be giving this a 3 or a 4 because for the price they are decent quality and pretty good size. But, they've got this really weird, chemical-y smell to them that just doesn't seem to go away. On top of that, the clothes that I put in them, seem to absorb the smell too.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew James

customer_reviews.title: looks good, is that weird fabric that is it really ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost any beige normal linen type furniture, looks good, is that weird fabric that is it really Fabric at all I like the big finger holes it’s kind of like to see what’s inside without letting you see
customer_reviews.author: Loveloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed with quality of the product. The handle fall apart easy and poorly made. Overpriced. Similiar products cheaper at Ollies, Big Lots or Dollar Store.
customer_reviews.author: Satwant S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids to manage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go in my 4 years old shelf so he can keep his toys in them instead all over the place..lol They are pretty sturdy and light weight and the handles are great so my son can manage them perfectly. I love the navy color with our beige shelf !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to put my mail in and other things around my desk. This is perfect. They look great and easy to put together which its very important to me. They are not too big but they are large enough for my needs. Just love them and if I decide I need more I will get more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Faye

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as the ones you find at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Same storage bins you find at walmart or target but the handle piece makes it easier to grab, it looks nicer than the regular cloth handle but basically ur normal foldable bin
customer_reviews.author: karencita D

customer_reviews.title: Decently storage cubes
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t the most amazing quality but they work for what I need them for. The color is pretty on point, I ordered gray. They look nice though. Very neutral and elegant, if that can be done with fabric storage cubes lol. Overall, I’ve had these for 4ish months and still holding up to daily usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Aceves

customer_reviews.title: They're a great storage bin.
customer_reviews.text: What I took a chance at was the size. I have several large bins like this one, but these were slightly smaller. My storage units holds the large 12.5 L x 12.5 H x 15" deep bins. I am so very disappointed that Walmart doesn't carry them anymore. I can't find them anywhere, and I had planned on organizing my craft room with all the units and the large black bins (with the single silver opening as a handle). They are wonderful, so I kept these smaller ones because I had a smaller unit that they somewhat fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I use it to organize my kids toys such as small figures, cars, and other light toys. I wouldn’t put any books or heavy objects in it. Quality is a little better than the 2 pack you can buy at target for ten bucks. This is a good product for the price you pay. If your looking for something more durable that won’t lose its shape over time, I suggest getting hard plastic bins or woven baskets. This product is made out of hard cardboard with fabric over it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama4

customer_reviews.title: Love these storage cubes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these storage boxes. I can always find a use for them! They work perfectly for kids toys both in our living room and in their rooms. Fits inside a 2x2 cube shelf perfect and has a nice handle on the front for it to be easy to slide forward, grab what you need and push back into place. Holds lots of toys without breaking or losing shape. Great product overall
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for simple storage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a uniform yet sturdy basic storage system for different items i.e. books, dog bandanas, folders, sandals etc. and these worked perfectly!! 6 bins for less than 20 bucks is a steal in comparison to other options! And the bins are fairly durable, they are a bit flimsy but you are purchasing fabric bins so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R

customer_reviews.title: Fine, not the best
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace some storage squares similar to this when I moved because I needed/wanted a different color but it was somehow impossible to find the size I need, so I settled for these - they do fine, but they are definitely not super sturdy and not as good as what I had before. Just an inch or two makes a big difference and I was unable to store as much as these. In the attached pic, I've turned them around because I don't like the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the value. Only thing I would say is that the product I received had a slight funky smell to it. ****update the smell has not gone away so I give them a 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but missing a part
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect !!️ BUT I have to come back and change my review. One of the boxes came without the inside square that keeps it from collapsing. I contacted support via email, and I haven’t received an reply. To get the missing piece. These are for my son’s room for at home school that just started 2 days ago and I don’t want to mess up his flow by returning
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great price, sturdy Nice appearance,
customer_reviews.text: They came super fast, fit in my organizer Cubby, they look very nice with the handle, definitke I do recommend this Brand, great price, Beat the Walmart 4.00 for as single one
customer_reviews.author: MYRNA BROWN

customer_reviews.title: they feel more sturdy than other fabric ones I've had
customer_reviews.text: This color is as vibrant as it appears in the pictures! In fact, I just ordered another 6! They fit perfectly in the black bookshelves of Ikea, which is where I've placed them. Even though they are foldable fabric, they feel more sturdy than other fabric ones I've had. Very easy was to add a pop of color to any bookcase, or any organizing you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: JenDJ

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, BUT THEY SMELL TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: These were just the right type of bins I was looking for BUT BEWARE OF THE SMELL THAT LINGERS WITH THESE STORAGE BINS. Really sad that they smell so terrible. I’ve had them for 3 weeks and used a ton of spray on them to mask their smell, but it’s not been helping. They are super cute but STINK.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: There was a slight smell to them when unboxed, but after airing them out in the backyard they are fine. Storage containers are just as pictured physically and visually. I purchased the gray ones. They’re very spacious and easy to slip out of the box and start using.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bins
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bookcase that I put these in years ago at Bed Bath & Beyond and finally got around to get storage bins. They were the perfect size and are study enough for my daughters toys and for her to take them out daily. The metal handle is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: rach.lynn6

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for dorm room storage for my son. Have not used yet. They seem strudy - plan to use for occasional storage and not every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product changed!
customer_reviews.text: Last year when I purchased these they were a sturdy, attractive canvas material. Durable and chic. This time they arrived as a thin, flimsy, tent like material I can see through. They arrived with holes. A shame how the quality has fallen.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other bins before, but this brand is by far my favorite. It is exactly the size they say they are, they are more durable than expected, making them perfect for my kids play room. they come in a large number of different colors that are exactly as rich and vibrant as the photos picture them. I have already bought more because I love them that much. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: William Manning

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these bins for the kids play room. They fold nicely if needing to be put away and are durable when in use and stand perfectly. I over pay with Thirty One organizing bins, these are much better!
customer_reviews.author: Deisy Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Helpfull Organizers
customer_reviews.text: The blue is a nice navy, the fabric is sturdy as you'd expect, and it really helped organize my living room area
customer_reviews.author: Trickman22

customer_reviews.title: Metal handle
customer_reviews.text: Eh, should consider buying bins that don’t have the metal trim. Our bins were used to hold toys, most of the 6 have all come off and since the metal clip is cheaper they won’t stay in place. Without the trim on it make them look cheap
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Storage space
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect! I needed something that could store quite a bit and keep my room a bit more compact. These were perfect. Plenty of space in the boxes themselves and they weren't too big size wise. Everything fit in the top shelf of my closet. If my bed frame was a bit taller they would have fit perfectly under there.
customer_reviews.author: Savonna Kaneen

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for price
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I had hoped but great product for the price. Only one handle instead of two so they have to put thoughtfully put back on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: A.Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cubbies. They are great quality. Same as the ones you would purchase at Target except these are much cheaper in price. I purchased 2 packs of these and ended up purchasing another pack the day after I got those. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: They have held up with an 8 year old boy......
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son's room. I needed them to be sturdy and I liked the look of the fabric ones so they worked out perfectly. I had to talk to him while we were setting them up (because he is 8) about being very careful how he pulls out his books. We have had them now for a few months and so far not even so much as a rip in them.
customer_reviews.author: Latika

customer_reviews.title: Works great, price is right
customer_reviews.text: These are being used in my master bedroom closet. Price is right. Quality is so-so, but will work. I put things in them that I don't use every day. My closet looks so much better while items are contained! I would buy these again. Also, I needed the smaller size of 12 inches, and these work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carrigan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These bins are reasonably sturdy, but I do love the silver handle. Plus, they fit my storage cube organizer perfectly; no major gaps. Definitely love how the color matches closer to other teal items in my room, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look good and fair price
customer_reviews.text: The little Fabric cubes shipped out and arrived on time. They look good and handles seem like they are attached really well. Guess my only gripe would be for them to be as big and the cabinets they are recommended for. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted and Better Looking Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted mid-tier quality, good looking, functional storage boxes of particular width, length and height. These met all my expectations (so 4 stars earned) and look better than I expected (fifth star). For the price, I'd say it was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Cardboard with cloth lining. What you'd expect for the price. I have no real complaints except that it would have been nice to have a handle on both sides for carrying rather than just one side for pulling out only.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution metal handles essential.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for cubbies. I started with some for shoes then bought another set for the hats and some toys. Makes my space seem so much cleaner. I like he metal handles the protruding handles seem to rip eventually and these seem to be very sturdy compared.
customer_reviews.author: Randah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to add these to our first babies nursery, until I got home and realized something had gotten into the package and shredded it to pieces. This would’ve been the perfect touch to it. Our dog is on a runner during the day and inside at night, so there is no way he could’ve gotten to it. He/she could’ve set it on the dumpster. This isn’t a review on the product as I couldn’t even get it, but the packaging definitely should’ve been better. I don’t even see a package, all I see is shredded cube drawers. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: mikayla capps

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, stable
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality! Color is spot on navy and the handles are nice, not too shiny. There is a separate bottom piece to keep it stable. I think they look really nice and I’m happy I went with these ones 😊
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: I got two sets of these to hold kids toys and about 3 months in they all started to get fuzzies. I have had to pull them out now because they look ragged. They do not hold up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cubies!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! They fit exact with the shelves that I got and held everything that I wanted to neatly and comfortably. Color matched the photo as well and worked really well for my room. Super happy with the outcome :)
customer_reviews.author: Celina Revollar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the cube storage shelves that I got at Walmart! Sturdy and solid construction. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: A. Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I finally decided to but these. I've needed to upgrade my fabric bins and these are the best ones I've ever bought. They're very sturdy and stylish and for the price it's perfect. they fit great on my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS teal color! Bought these to hide my DVD collection under my TV console. Three fit PERFECTLY on the bottom console shelf and I have 3 spare bins for another space.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a Perfect and collapsible cube for your cubbies it's not cheaply made I only wish they didn't become "unavailable" so often, and VERY difficult to order more. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Take your measurements to make sure you’re not disappointed. These were a tad smaller than I wanted but they’re so pretty I don’t even care! Good quality. Holding lots of toys right now just fine. Sorry for the messy pic but it’s real life lol!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Reese

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the reinforced handles on these, and the bins themselves are nice and sturdy compared to comparable bins. I’m using them to store clothes, and my toddler has yet to destroy them!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchy B

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built but smelly
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bins but they smell really bad. I've been trying for over a month to get rid of the smell by airing them out, cleaning them, and adding baking soda to absorb the smell but nothing has worked. They are less smelly but I still don't want to store my clothes in them.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: In love with these bins! Color is gorgeous . I went with the turquoise and silver handle bins. Looks awesome in my apt and great quality! Definitely a great find for the price and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BELLA AME

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have around the house in closets, cabinets and the trunk. Keeps things organized and neat looking. Price is better then any other retail store
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be really flimsy and terrible for the price. These are AMAZING! My children use these daily and they haven't torn at all! My children are tiny wrecking balls but these have withstood! I honestly think you should buy these if you're considering them!
customer_reviews.author: Tempest

customer_reviews.title: Pay a Little More For These! They Hold Up!
customer_reviews.text: After buying some similar ones from other stores for maybe a dollar less, I got these! Best decision! The others have ripped and fell apart. These are thick and sturdy! Will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: leslie warner

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy, as they are 6 for $20.00 They are standard size , very durable and sturdy. These fit in my granddaughters shelving and match her comforter , Nice useable accessories for such a small price. Highly recommend product and seller . I would purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burbo

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: They seem decent for the price except the smell. I’m letting them air out before I put anything in them in hopes the smell goes away. If the smell goes away I would probably give it 4 stars instead of 3. ****update**** I am returning these- won’t air out. I don’t want to put anything in them because they smell so bad. Updated to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mama

customer_reviews.title: Great bins
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking storage bins that were perfect for my laundry room shelves. Came with a bottom insert for sturdiness. Great price. I’d buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fabric cubes for Closemaid drawer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these fabric cubes to put into my 12 space drawer. I have had them for a month now. They are sturdy and look as new as when I purchased them. They have a good amount of space to store clothes, essentials, or make up. They are great and I have no regrets on purchasing them! They fit perfectly into my drawer they measure 11 inch x 11 inch x 11 inch. They are PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: isela

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the color..!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage cubes..!! I bought these in the color aqua and they are VERY vibrant in color which is what I was looking for. I wanted a color that would stand out and these definitely do. Right now I am using these in place of a dresser and they slide in and out with very little friction. The shelf I bought from walmart and these storage bins fit just right. So far so good..!!
customer_reviews.author: Melani Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. I am currently using these to store bathroom supplies such as bottles, towels, medications, etc. and they’re working great. I wouldn’t recommend using them for heavy duty items as they are a little flimsy and maybe wouldn’t be best for the job. But for small items, clothes, things on the lighter side they’re great. I like the fabric and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jesselyn Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Standard construction, but they look SO good!
customer_reviews.text: The handles elevate the standard storage box look, and I used 18 in navy to streamline my storage area. Now it looks more sophisticated.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is almost perfect with this product. I like how it came with a square insert to make the bottom more stable, but that doesn't do much for the sides. I just wish the sides were thicker and less flimsy. Overall at the end of the day they do their job and hides the mess behind a pretty container.
customer_reviews.author: su s.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous navy blue fabric bins with silver handle detail. Amazing price. Was a little nervous about buying as it was listed as used...but you would never have known. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: KJT

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these storage bins to everyone looking for affordable, well constructed cubes! Who knew how many options there were out there, but I'm so glad I stopped and purchased these! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ALISSA

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: The are as sturdy as any other fabric storage bins I've got. They have a sturdy cardboard on all sides and look great. You really cant do better for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but way too small for the standard cube storage. They look silly next to my regular size containers. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. as to be expected sturdiness - a little flimsy, but not more than any other cube bin. they fold down nicely for storage. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sglo

customer_reviews.title: One handle
customer_reviews.text: There is only one handle on the bin, not one on each side. This is a deal breaker for us. We need to be able to carry them with two hands.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy great too organizes your clothes but also pretty for open shelving they fit a lot of things and I love the value pack
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... Fits perfectly into the storage cube unit I also bought from Amazon... Holds most of my kids toys... Best bang for my buck!
customer_reviews.author: creative_one

customer_reviews.title: Good boxes to have
customer_reviews.text: I used these in an organizer shelf that I just purchased. They fit well and seem durable, they are also easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amaryllis

customer_reviews.title: Durable Storage Bins
customer_reviews.text: I really like these storage bins. They seem durable, and they keep my items neat on my closet shelf, which was my goal.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The handle part is a very cheap looking gray plastic so I returned these!
customer_reviews.author: coastiewife

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very classy.
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I was expecting. I’ve only had them for a while, but they look really classy on my sleeves, and are much thicker than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa121

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty color and stores a lot! I would buy again! I bought gray and they are a great touch to my cube storage organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use in the children's area at church. They work perfectly. Hides all the bits and bobs.
customer_reviews.author: TexxasGal

customer_reviews.title: Just smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy it is. However it’s smaller than expected. It still had good space for storage and it seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: YoNeko

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: its cheap material. Smaller than I wanted but we are using it for our clothes instead of having to buy another dresser. They fit great on the shelves in our closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard size to Find In stores
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt find this size in a store so I came to amazon .. thank goodness.. these are the perfect size and color. Im very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Use it in Walmart cubbies and use it for clothing storage, nice and pretty slick look, just what I was expecting from the pictures on the product
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have these all over my home and they are perfect for multiple uses! Nice and sturdy and can hold heavy things as well! I love them
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Milstead

product_meta.title: Household Essentials 80-1 Foldable Fabric Storage Bins | Set Of 6 Cubby Cubes With Handles | Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:BlackHousehold essentials set of 6 black fabric storage bin cubes are classic collapsible storage bins with a single grommet handle for pull-out storage that is Fast, simple, and completely color-coordinated. This great set of storage bins transforms home and office clutter into great design. Each bin has sturdy fiberboard sides and base with durably polypropylene fabric on top. PP cloth is strong and durable, and it wipes clean with a damp cloth. Ideally sized to fit on shelves or inside open cubes for a make-shift dresser or desk, these cloth storage bins keep organization simple. Perfect for organizing clothing, accessories, cosmetics, toiletries, office supplies and more! Each bin in this set of 6 is 11 inches high, 11 inches wide, and 11 inches deep.
feature_bullets: Six collapsible black cubbie storage baskets for organizing offices, nurseries, and bedrooms
Bins feature single grommet handle for quick pull-out storage
Containers fold flat for easy storage when not in use
Sturdy fiberboard sides and base to help organize toys, blankets, shoes and much more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,365 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
